interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Operation.EnergyUsage
interface.description: Interface that exposes information on Power and Energy consumption of the device.

property.name: CurrentPower
property.description: The instantaneous power consumption of the device in W. 7fff ffff ffff ffff (NaN) indicates an unknown value.

property.name: PowerPrecision
property.description: The precision of the CurrentPower property. i.e. the number of watts the actual power consumption must change before CurrentPower is updated.

property.name: PowerUpdateRate
property.description: The minimum time between updates of the CurrentPower property

property.name: CumulativeEnergy
property.description: The cumulative power consumption of the device in kWHr. 7fff ffff ffff ffff (NaN) indicates an unknown value.

property.name: EnergyPrecision
property.description: The precision of the CumulativeEnergy property. i.e. the number of kWh the actual energy consumption must change before CumulativeEnergy is updated.

property.name: EnergyUpdateRate
property.description: The minimum time between updates of the CumulativeEnergy property

method.name: ResetCumulativeEnergy
method.description: Resets the value of CumulativeEnergy to 0
